com.leon.hfu.hotelReservationCalculation

Class Reservation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.leon.hfu.hotelReservationCalculation.Reservation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Showable

    public class Reservation
extends Object
implements Showable
    Represents a reservation on any ReservableObject. TODO: add person count handling
    Author:
    Stefan Hahn

    • Constructor Detail

      • Reservation

        public Reservation(Date arrival,
           Date departure,
           int persons,
           ReservableObject reservableObject)
            throws ReservationException
        Creates a new Reservation with given parameters.
        Parameters:
        arrival - Arrival date of this Reservation
        departure - Departure of this Reservation
        persons - Persons of this Reservation
        reservableObject - ReservableObject this Reservation is linked to
        Throws:
        ReservationException - Thrown if Reservation is corrupted, arrival in past, departure before arrival or concurrent reservations

      • Reservation

        public Reservation(Date arrival,
           int nights,

           ReservableObject reservableObject)

        Creates a new Reservation with given parameters.
        Parameters:
        arrival - Arrival date of this Reservation
        nights - Nights to sleep over of this Reservation
        persons - Persons of this Reservation
        reservableObject - ReservableObject this Reservation is linked to
        Throws:
        ReservationException - Thrown if Reservation is corrupted, arrival in past, departure before arrival or concurrent reservations
